page.title: 06Society East of World's End
page.content: The area has now only a small element of true countrymen living in it. These people are very concerned with the upkeep and the conservation of the countryside around. The rest of the people living here are fairly rich commuters who use the area as a dormitory town. These people like the country but do not take part in conserving it. We asked a Publican what he thought of the new buildings in construction in the area. He replied saying that he did not mind them. It will bring more people to his pub. Farmers hate this development. The area is changing to an{urban} community. The majority of people are more concerned with money and holidays rather than upkeep though one village has entered a Keep Tidy competition.
